name: War Chariots: Royal Legion
description:
Plunge into the world of the Middle Ages!
Lead the royal legion of war chariots and reconquer your lands from insidious invaders!
Conquer enemy buildings.
Use magical runes to strengthen your buildings and weaken those of the enemy!
Earn emeralds and improve fighting qualities of your troops.
Prove your dashing courage and show off your tactical cunning.

You will enjoy more than 50 distinctandinteresting levels.
Several enemy clans and different types of buildings.
Plenty of magic runes for all battle occasions!
Great opportunities to improve combat and strategic skills.
Loadful of GOLD!!!... :)
And, of course, eye-popping graphics and atmosphere!
